E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Javy Lopez
Dear Sir,
Javy Lopez is hitting the ball well at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .350, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

to promote him soon!
